info.author: Dan Lenski
info.description:
This is a small Python extension which allows you to manipulate the
binary representation of floating-point values in the standard IEEE
754 64-bit format (= C double type or Python float type).

Basically, the module includes methods to print integers and floating
point values in binary format, to convert floating-point values to and
from 64-bit integer representations, and to split/join floating-point
values into (sign, exponent, mantissa) tuples.
info.name: ieee754bin
info.html_description:
This is a small Python extension which allows you to manipulate the binary representation of floating-point values in the standard IEEE 754 64-bit format (= C double type or Python float type).

Basically, the module includes methods to print integers and floating point values in binary format, to convert floating-point values to and from 64-bit integer representations, and to split/join floating-point values into (sign, exponent, mantissa) tuples.
